title: Chocolate Nut Fruit Salad
ingredients: ['610g strawberry yoghurt', '4 tablespoons honey', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '115g chopped almonds', '60g chopped cashews', '55g raisins', "4 tablespoons chocolate Smarties or M & M's", '2 large oranges, peeled, sectioned and cut into bite-size pieces', '3 bananas, peeled and sliced', '325g chopped pears', '400g chopped grapefruit']
